name: unburned
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
not burnt: Active fires are shown on the map in red, and unburned areas are shown in green. A large portion of the exhaust from these engines is unburned fuel.
More examplesFewer examplesPure biodiesel emits 67 percent fewer unburned hydrocarbons.At the edge of the destroyed forest lie strips of intact trees and unburned grass. He was relieved when he returned to find his home unburned.When the flame goes out, the valve remains open for a short time, allowing gas to escape unburned.
